General.Name: Suzhou Chunqiu Electronic Technology Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Suzhou Chunqiu Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of structural component modules and related precision molds for notebook computers and electronic modules in China and internationally. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Kunshan, China.

3.Name: Mr. Zhenjie  Zhang
3.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
